comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Elizabeth Tucker Kinney (1904- ) was a professor of Plant Science at Mount Holyoke College; her papers are at Mount Holyoke: asteria.fivecolleges.edu/findaids/mountholyoke/mshm075.html She married Leonard G. Worley in 1931, and had two daughters.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Thank you for this additional information, Penny!

Susannah
Smithsonian Institution Archives
